Event plan

What R topics do you want to see at R-Ladies? london@rladies.org

Reproducible R docs and GitHub

Steph Locke

Event date: February 13, 2017

We are over the moon to have Steph Locke, a prominent R lady practitioner on the global tech scene, doing an Intermediate-level session on git/github and Rmarkdown for R-Ladies London!! She is based in Cardiff, hence we are privileged to have her in the big smoke for this session. [Read More]
Tags: intermediate
